promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic bull normal-type pokemon with dark skin. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thunderhide, a a massive epic bull normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Rock Bullet, Raging Tremble. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "normal" or "Thunderhide". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bull-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Roaming the sprawling meadows, this colossal beast channels its mighty tremors and stone projectiles to protect its herd.
